content: http://www.military.com/news/article/April-2009/some-se...rent-caregivers.html No special financial assistance should be given. If they need a hardship discharge for child care give them one. No one made them sign up. bs "The mother of three Airmen is asking the military to extend financial assistance to grandparents who are caring for their grandchildren because of a military deployment. "
